name: Battle Lands
description:
Early Access. Please send any feedback to support@unrealbyte.com, anything is very welcome.

You must lead our army to conquer enemies castle before they conquer you. Battle Lands is a real-time action / strategy game. Manage and lead your army in each wave to destroy its defenses and conquer its castle.

Features:

- Attack in real time. You have a limited number of unit slots, plan your strategy and modify your army enter each wave to break the enemy's defense.
- Research new technologies to strengthen the strength of your army.
- Conquer the enemy castle and claim rewards.
- Create towers and obstacles to defend your castle.
- Use incredible skills to help you in battle.
